cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25,000 miles.
This one goes really fast. And it makes you look cool.
Red interior. Black exterior. White grill. Your smill will be white that is.
0 to 60 in under 60 minutes. Probably under 60 seconds. Definitely under 60 minutes.
All your friends will want this car. So buy eight for all your friends.
This is an immaculate Audi with only 75 miles on it. We don't know how you don't jump on this shiny beauty.
